body_content.explanation: the earth and all the people, places, and things on it:
examples: Different parts of the world have very different climatic conditions.
Which bridge has the longest span in the world?
News of the disaster shocked the (whole/entire) world.
We live in a changing world and people must learn to adapt.
She's a world authority on foetal development.

body_content.explanation: a group of things such as countries or animals, or an area of human activity or understanding:
examples: stars from the rock music world
Unexpected things can happen in the world of subatomic particles.

body_content.explanation: a planet or other part of the universe, especially one where life might or does exist:
examples: There was a man on the news last night who believes we've been visited by beings from other worlds.
